article_title: Your Weakest Security Link? Your Children
article_text:
What do you do when the biggest threat to your cybersecurity lives under your own roof?

It’s a fact of life online: a network is only as strong as its weakest link. For many people, that weakest link is their children. They inadvertently download viruses. They work around security to visit sites their parents don’t want them to. They run up huge...

twitter.description: They are always making mischief online, one step ahead of their parents. Here’s how to rein them in—and teach them life lessons, too.
twitter.title: Your Weakest Security Link? Your Children

image.alt: Want to safeguard your online privacy? Rein in your children.
